scripts.gen:types:db: cd packages/supabase && supabase gen types typescript --local > types/database.ts
scripts.db:generate-migration: echo 'Run: cd packages/supabase && supabase migration new <migration_name>'
scripts.db:setup-local: bun db:start && echo 'Waiting for Supabase to start...' && sleep 10 && bun db:push && bun gen:types
scripts.clean: find . -name 'node_modules' -type d -exec rm -rf {} + 2>/dev/null || true && find . -name 'pnpm-lock.yaml' -delete && find . -name 'package-lock.json' -delete && find . -name 'bun.lockb' -delete && find . -name '.turbo' -type d -exec rm -rf {} + 2>/dev/null || true && turbo run clean
